languages.text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +25 Coercion.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an ability, that ally gains +10% melee damage until the end of the round.

The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
装备者获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}。
每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响盟友时，该名盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高10%，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}。
每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响盟友时，该名盟友的近战伤害都会提高10%，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。

languages.text:
Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напору{/g}.
Когда персонаж выбирает союзника в качестве цели {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, этот союзник до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} наносит на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +25 к Напору.
Когда персонаж выбирает союзника в качестве цели способности, этот союзник до конца раунда наносит на 10% больше урона в ближнем бою.

Дает +25 к Напору.
Когда персонаж выбирает союзника в качестве цели способности, этот союзник до конца раунда наносит на 10% больше урона в ближнем бою.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}威圧{/g}を25獲得する。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使って味方をターゲットにするたび、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%増加する。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}を25獲得する。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使って味方をターゲットにするたび、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了時まで近接攻撃が10％増加する。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}.
Cada vez que el objetivo usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} con un aliado, este último obtiene +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} hasta finalizar el {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}.
Cada vez que el objetivo usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} con un aliado, este último obtiene +10 % de daño cuerpo a cuerpo hasta finalizar la {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}.
Wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}.
Immer wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält dieser Verbündete +10 % Nahkampfschaden bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +25 d'{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur cible un allié à l'aide d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, celui-ci bénéficie de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} kazanır.
Giyen kişi, bir dost birimi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ile hedeflerse o dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +%10 artar.
